contents.title: AI CHATBOT PLATFORM
contents.description: Full-stack conversational AI platform with NLP, real-time chat, and multi-language support. Built with React, Node.js, and TensorFlow for intelligent responses.

contents.title: BLOCKCHAIN WALLET
contents.description: Secure cryptocurrency wallet with multi-chain support, transaction history, and real-time price tracking. Features hardware wallet integration and DeFi protocols.

contents.title: REAL-TIME ANALYTICS DASHBOARD
contents.description: Enterprise-grade analytics platform with live data visualization, custom metrics, and predictive insights. Processes millions of events per second.

contents.title: E-COMMERCE PLATFORM
contents.description: Modern online marketplace with payment integration, inventory management, and AI-powered recommendations. Supports multi-vendor architecture.

contents.title: VIDEO STREAMING SERVICE
contents.description: Netflix-like streaming platform with adaptive bitrate, CDN integration, and content recommendation engine. Supports 4K streaming and offline downloads.

contents.title: COLLABORATIVE CODE EDITOR
contents.description: Real-time collaborative IDE with syntax highlighting, live cursors, and integrated terminal. Supports 50+ programming languages and pair programming.

contents.title: SOCIAL MEDIA ANALYTICS
contents.description: Comprehensive social media monitoring tool with sentiment analysis, trend detection, and automated reporting. Tracks engagement across platforms.

contents.title: IOT SMART HOME HUB
contents.description: Automated DIY smart home system with Arduino & ESP32. Controls lighting, temperature, security cameras with voice commands and mobile app integration.

contents.title: ROBOTIC ARM
contents.description: 6-axis robotic arm with precision control, object detection using computer vision, and programmable movements. Built with servo motors and Raspberry Pi.

contents.title: VOTING MACHINE
contents.description: Electronic voting system with secure authentication, real-time vote counting, and tamper-proof design. Features LCD display and encrypted data storage.

contents.title: DRONE AUTOPILOT
contents.description: Custom flight controller for quadcopter with GPS navigation, obstacle avoidance, and autonomous flight modes. Includes telemetry and FPV system.

contents.title: WEATHER STATION
contents.description: IoT weather monitoring system with temperature, humidity, pressure sensors. Uploads data to cloud dashboard with historical trends and forecasting.

contents.title: INTRODUCTION TO WEB DEVELOPMENT
contents.description: Comprehensive workshop covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript fundamentals, and modern web development practices. Hands-on projects included.

contents.title: REACT & MODERN JAVASCRIPT
contents.description: Advanced workshop on React hooks, state management, and building scalable applications. Covers Redux, Context API, and performance optimization.

contents.title: MACHINE LEARNING BASICS
contents.description: Introduction to ML algorithms, neural networks, and practical applications. Includes Python, TensorFlow, and real-world datasets.

contents.title: BUILDING MICROSERVICES
contents.description: Workshop on microservices architecture, Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud deployment. Covers API design and service communication.

contents.title: THE FUTURE OF WEB3
contents.description: Tech talk exploring blockchain technology, decentralized applications, and the evolution of the internet. Discussed at TechConf 2024.

contents.title: BUILDING SCALABLE SYSTEMS
contents.description: Presentation on system design, load balancing, and handling millions of users. Shared insights from production experience.

contents.title: AI IN MODERN APPLICATIONS
contents.description: Talk on integrating AI/ML into web applications, practical use cases, and ethical considerations. Presented at AI Summit 2024.

contents.title: AWS CERTIFIED SOLUTIONS ARCHITECT
contents.description: Professional certification for designing distributed systems on AWS

contents.title: GOOGLE CLOUD PROFESSIONAL
contents.description: Advanced certification in Google Cloud Platform services and architecture

contents.title: KUBERNETES ADMINISTRATOR
contents.description: Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) for container orchestration

contents.title: TENSORFLOW DEVELOPER
contents.description: TensorFlow Developer Certificate for machine learning expertise
